mapper.sql: SELECT DISTINCT u.user_id AS user_id, ap.app_id AS app_id, m.resource_id AS resource_id, m.application_id AS application_id, m.name AS name, m.description AS description, m.code AS code, m.parent_code AS parent_code, m.status AS status FROM gar_users u LEFT JOIN gar_user_application ap ON ap.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN gar_user_dept ud ON ud.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN gar_role_dept rd ON rd.dept_id = ud.dept_id LEFT JOIN gar_role_authority ra ON ra.role_id = rd.role_id -- LEFT JOIN gar_authority_resource am ON am.authority_id = ra.authority_id -- LEFT JOIN gar_resources m ON m.resource_id = am.resource_id LEFT JOIN gar_authorities a ON a.authority_id = ra.authority_id LEFT JOIN gar_resources m ON m.path LIKE a.wildcard WHERE m.status = 1
mapper.select: SELECT ur.code FROM () AS ur WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND ur.app_id = #{appId}
